definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: To keep a fresh supply take one or two cloves from each bulb and replant them.
sentences.chinese: 保持新鮮供給要花一至兩丁香每個燈泡和補種。
有些農民可能補種玉米。

sentences.english: Now the two is of course the descendants replant .
sentences.chinese: 現在的兩株當然是後人補種的。

sentences.english: A vaccine as soon as possible to replant it , 30 micrograms of high-dose.
sentences.chinese: 儘快去補種一次疫苗吧，30微克大劑量的。
